H0.text: who wrote the original little red riding hood story. Brothers Grimm

H1.text: who wrote the original little red riding hood story. Madame de Villeneuve

H2.text: who wrote the original little red riding hood story. Giambattista Basile

H3.text: who wrote the original little red riding hood story. Charles Perrault

A4.text: Perrault had written 'Little Red Riding Hood' as a warning to readers about strangers preying on young girls walking through the forest.

A5.text: Some of Perrault's versions of old stories influenced the German versions published by the Brothers Grimm more than 100 years later.
